data.name: Knight's Retreat - Tilt Five Edition
data.detailed_description:
ENJOY A NEW OPTIONAL AUGMENTED REALITY EXPERIENCE WITH THE TILT FIVE™ SYSTEM!




Knights Retreat now supports Tilt Five™!

Level up your game night with tabletop holograms! The Tilt Five™ holographic gaming system transforms tabletop and video games into 3D vibrant holographic environments. Using the Tilt Five™ augmented reality (AR) glasses, Gameboard, and Wand controller, you can immerse yourself--and friends--in experiences like never before. Visit Tilt Five's website to find out how to bring Knights Retreat alive on your tabletop!

With Tilt Five™, players will see the beautiful 3d art of Knights Retreat coming to life in an incredible augmented reality experience!

data.short_description: Play Knights Retreat in an incredible augmented reality experience using Tilt Five™ System!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • Storage: 550 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: You need Tilt Five™ glasses, Tilt Five™ wand, Tilt Five™ gameboard
